Helper function to copy and zip projects

Source: R/invcop.R
invcop.Rd

invcop help to copy and zip projects

invcop(
  in_name = getwd(),
  out_name,
  all = FALSE,
  main = TRUE,
  ef = TRUE,
  est = TRUE,
  network = TRUE,
  veh_rds = FALSE,
  veh_csv = TRUE,
  zip = TRUE
)

Arguments

in_name

Character; Name of current project.

out_name

Character; Name of output project.

all

Logical; copy ALL (and for once) or not.

main

Logical; copy or not.

ef

Logical; copy or not.

est

Logical; copy or not.

network

Logical; copy or not.

veh_rds

Logical; copy or not.

veh_csv

Logical; copy or not.

zip

Logical; zip or not.

Value

emission estimation g/h

Note

This function was created to copy and zip project without the emis.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
# Do not run
} # }
